        "e0af364484b24e678a2b1e35b8477d17": {
          "id": "e0af364484b24e678a2b1e35b8477d17",
          "name": "Add new service to variable",
          "script": "(function execute() {\n    if (vaInputs.services_to_add == \"\"){\n        vaInputs.services_to_add = \"\\\"Workflow Directives\\\": [\";\n    } else {\n        vaInputs.services_to_add = vaInputs.services_to_add + \", \";\n    }\n    vaInputs.services_to_add = vaInputs.services_to_add + \"{\\\"describe_the_type_of_workflow_needed\\\": \\\"\" + vaInputs.service_to_add + \"\\\", \\\"embed_payment\\\": false,\\\"include_digital_signature\\\": false,\\\"map\\\": false}\";\n})()\n",
          "stepType": "ScriptAction",
          "applicability": {
            "value": "",
            "mode": "query"
          }
        },
